content: #13080 Just some minor cleanup in algebraic geometry. This one unlocks some further cleanup in CommRingCat, which further unlocks an example in my tutorial working cleanly, so if anyone is able to hit merge on this, much appreciated. :-)
Assuming it is this, you can sign up virtually https://fm.csl.sri.com/SSFT24/index.html
No, it's the ICMS workshop Heather and Maria are organizing in Edinburgh. But yes, I'll post it somewhere.
There's some further cleanup in #13107. Should be straightforward. I'll have more stacked on top shortly.
